mainSequence.step: Admin requests to view the list of advertisements
List Advertisements View displays the list of advertisements
Admin clicks on the edit button of an advertisement
List Advertisements View redirects to Edit Advertise View
Edit Advertise View shows the content of the advertisement
Admin edits the advertisement data and clicks on the save button
Edit Advertise View sends the information to AdsController
AdsController validates the data and saves it
AdsModel saves the data and returns the saved data to AdsController
AdsController returns the result of saving the advertisement to Edit Advertise View
Edit Advertise View displays the edited advertisement to Admin
